attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The Attorney General has been fined £5,000 after being found to have breached laws designed to stop illegal immigrants being employed. Laws which she helped pass. She has demonstrated that she is unable to follow or understand the law and is therefore not fit to perform her duties.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
